alert.note: Alert for Columbiana; Harrison; Jefferson (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 2:13PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG WIND WILL IMPACT THE AREA THROUGH 315 PM EST... At 211 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers with strong wind along a line extending from near Columbiana to 6 miles west of Wellsville to 8 miles southwest of Wintersville. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cranberry, New Castle, Weirton, Steubenville, Butler, Franklin Park, East Liverpool, Oil City, Aliquippa, Beaver Falls, Grove City, and Franklin. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 31. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 76 and 127. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 6 and 41. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 2 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
